title: Poltergeists and the Paranormal - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 10/8/20
itunes:title: Poltergeists and the Paranormal - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 10/8/20
description:
George Noory and Dr. Melvyn Willin discuss his research into the violent haunting which may or may not have been a hoax, as well as his skepticism that many paranormal cases may not be real.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
